description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav, which renders a top navigation bar for the web application. The navigation bar includes branding, a search input, navigation links, and action buttons for quick access to chat, notifications, and other quick actions.

methods.name: TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the top navigation bar with brand, search, and quick action buttons. Accepts props for handling actions when the buttons are clicked.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick }) {$/
